```{r include = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
```

## ggplot: mpg data

Display dataset

```{r}
mpg
```

## displ on hwy

```{r}
ggplot(mpg, aes(x=displ, y=hwy)) + geom_point()
```

## color on class 

And adjust size

```{r out.width = "50%"}
ggplot(mpg, aes(x=displ, y=hwy, color=class)) + geom_point()
```

## Facets on class

```{r}
ggplot(mpg, aes(x=displ, y=hwy, color=manufacturer)) + geom_point() +
  facet_grid(~class)
```
